## 13) ูุซุงู ูุชุฎุตุต ุจุงููุดุฑูุน (ุงุฎุชุจุงุฑ E2E ููุตูุญุฉ ุงูุฑุฆูุณูุฉ ูุนุฑุถ ุงูุตูุญุงุช ูู Manifest)

```typescript
// File: frontend/tests/e2e/homepage-manifest.spec.ts
import { test, expect } from '@playwright/test';

test('home lists all pages from manifest with working links', async ({ page }) => {
  await page.goto('/');
  // ููุชุฑุถ ูุฌูุฏ data-testid ููู ุนูุตุฑ ุจุทุงูุฉ ุตูุญุฉ
  const cards = await page.getByTestId('page-card').all();
  expect(cards.length).toBeGreaterThan(0);

  // ุชุญููู ูู ุฃูู ุจุทุงูุฉ ููุซุงู
  const first = cards[0];
  await expect(first.getByRole('link')).toBeVisible();
  const href = await first.getByRole('link').getAttribute('href');
  expect(href).toBeTruthy();

  // ุงูุชุญ ุงูุฑุงุจุท ูุชุฃูุฏ ูู ุนุฏู ูุฌูุฏ ุฃุฎุทุงุก UI ุฃุณุงุณูุฉ
  await first.getByRole('link').click();
  await expect(page.getByTestId('app-root')).toBeVisible();
});
```
